definition: To refuse or decline something, typically used when expressing a negative response to an offer, invitation, or request.

examples.english: She politely declined to come along.

examples.german: Er lehnt jede Form von Gewalt ab.
examples.english: He rejects any form of violence.

examples.german: Die Firma lehnte den Antrag auf Rückerstattung ab.
examples.english: The company declined the request for a refund.

examples.german: Der Kunde lehnte die vorgeschlagene Lösung ab.
examples.english: The customer rejected the proposed solution.
